citations.narrative:
In the outside portion of the sheltered facility at least two enclosures had excessive fecal build up on the flooring. The
licensee stated they were last cleaned 2 days ago. A build up of feces is a disease hazard and can attract pest. The
licensee must ensure all surfaces which come in contact with the dogs are spot cleaned daily.
To be corrected by: April 13, 2022.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
In the outside portion of the sheltered facility at least two enclosures had excessive fecal build up on the flooring.  The 
licensee stated they were last cleaned 2 days ago.  A build up of feces is a disease hazard and can attract pest. The 
licensee must ensure all surfaces which come in contact with the dogs are spot cleaned daily. 
To be corrected by: April 13, 2022. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
